post:
Hello, i would like to offer some OpenVz VPS for free, new projects, scripts, or whatever you have in mind.

    128MB RAM
    256 MB Burst RAM
    10GB RAID 10 Disk
    1 E5-2620 2Ghz CPU
    500 GB Bandwidth
    1 IP Address & IPv6

*NO panel
*when you request for the VPS, please add your site link with the project info.

why? because some people need a little push, and i would like to help.

questions? post here or PM me with the info of your project.

right now i can give 5 vps, we will see what happen...

and i hope im not breaking the rules here...

thanks

Alejandro.
